document_data.caption: The holy symbol of Vataqatal.
document_data.name: Vataqatal
document_data.title:
The Warrior-Slave
Master of the Battlefield
document_data.mainbody:
__NOTOC__ '''Vataqatal''' was the [[Zakhara]]n war god. He wanted his followers to grow by testing their strength of body and will and preached the importance of duty. He was a [[Zakharan pantheon|local god]] worshiped mainly in the northern parts of the Land of Fate that bordered on foreign lands. Vataqal's symbol was a red-bladed scimitar. The Warrior-Slave had been described as a muscular, veiled warrior with glowing red eyes who wore robes and battle-worn [[lamellar]] armor and bore a great scimitar.
He was worshiped by warriors, especially [[mamluk]]s and [[faris|farisans]] who valued duty and dedication to one's service.
